description.db:para: This table is used by the dispatcher module. It contains the sets of destinations used for load balancing and dispatching. More information about the dispatcher module can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;dispatcher.html

column.name: socket
column.description: Local Socket to be used when sending requests (traffic and probes) to the destination - must be an listener configured in opensips.

column.name: state
column.description: The state of the destination (0 enabled, 1 disabled , 2 probing)

column.name: weight
column.description: The weight of the destination (integer or socket definition)

column.name: priority
column.description: The priority of each destination (only useful with algorithm 8)

column.name: attrs
column.description: Attribute string - custom, opaque string that will be pushed into script when this destination will be selected
